subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Lost in the Fog, the 2005 Eclipse Award winner as the sprinter of the year, has cancer in his spleen and abdomen and would have to be euthanized soon, his trainer said.
snippet: Lost in the Fog, the 2005 Eclipse Award winner as the sprinter of the year, has cancer in his spleen and abdomen and would have to be euthanized soon, his trainer said.
